meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spacious.
meanings.sent1: The spaciousness of the room allowed for comfortable movement.
meanings.sent2: I admired the spaciousness of the park as I walked through it.
meanings.sent3: The cat enjoyed the spaciousness of the box, even though it was a tight fit.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a vast landscape of spaciousness, filled with endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The spaciousness of the ocean stretched out before us, calming our souls.

meanings.definition: The extent or size of a space.
meanings.sent1: The spaciousness of the field made it perfect for a game of soccer.
meanings.sent2: The spaciousness of the warehouse allowed for easy storage of large items.
meanings.sent3: The spaciousness of the refrigerator surprised me when I saw how much food it could hold.
meanings.sent4: The spaciousness of the desert seemed to go on forever, with no end in sight.
meanings.sent5: The spaciousness of the closet was a welcome change from my cramped apartment.
